meanings.sent1: The cheetah is very pacey when chasing its prey.
meanings.sent2: The pacey rabbit quickly hopped away from the fox.
meanings.sent3: The pacey squirrel raced up the tree to escape the curious cat.
meanings.sent4: Her pacey mind absorbed information like a sponge.
meanings.sent5: The pacey river rushed over the rocks, never slowing down.

meanings.sent1: The music had a lively pacey beat that made everyone dance.
meanings.sent2: The pacey of the car increased as it zoomed down the highway.
meanings.sent3: The pacey of the race was so fast that even the spectators were out of breath.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to move at a pacey during the thrilling roller coaster ride.
meanings.sent5: The pacey of the clock ticking echoed through the empty room.
